reviews.review: Its a great game if you dont like shooting games and are a fan of puzzle games with a story well this is the game for you.
情侣小游戏  单身狗可以约心仪对象一起玩

Пройдя эту игру я понял что я не настолько туп как думал. 
12 "тортиков" из 10
this game will make you unlucky ;)
this is my favorite game, ever, please play it
Ein würdiger Nachfolger des ersten Teils. Es gibt nun deutlich mehr Rätsel, das Spiel hat sich insgesamt für mich leider nicht so rund angefühlt wie der erste Teil.
beyin yakan ama arkadaşınla çözmeye çalışırkenki sohbet sarıyor

惟一缺點 : 你之後會心心念念甚麼時候會有第三集
The only problem of the game :  It make you thinking for Portal 3 everyday, every minutes, every moment.....
Нету слов, когдато умели делать игри....(

Gra jest bardzo dobra, dobrze napisana fabuła, niezła grafika i świetna muzyka. Gra nie ma wysokich wymagań jeśli chodzi o sprzęt, ale grając w Portala trzeba wysilić swój umysł, bo łamigłówki są bardzo wymagające. Poza świetnym trybem singleplayer możemy także tworzyć swoje własne pokoje oraz grać w pokoje stworzone przez innych graczy, również ze znajomymi.
One of my favorites of all time. Challenging and rewarding puzzles and excellent story telling.
Stephen Merchant is just amazing. There's a part in the game where we don't get to hear him for a while, and that was hard for me. :)

◻ Małe dzieci (0-6) 
◻ Dzieci (7-9) 
☑ Nastolatkowie (10-17)

◻ Nie istnieje

◻ Jest ok...

Poziom trudności:
◻ Nie do przejścia
☑ Ciężkie, jeśli nie znajdziesz odpowiedniego walktrough
◻ Jeszcze są szanse na normalne przejście
◻ Łatwa
◻ Wystarczy że umiesz chodzić


Multiplayer:
☑ Występuje
◻ Nie występuje


Cena:
◻ Gucci już tyle nie kosztuje
◻ Jeśli jesteś oszczędny, to dasz radę kupić
☑ Nie za tanie, nie za drogie
◻ Tanie
◻ Wystarczy że jesteś bezdomnym
◻ Darmowe

This game is intellectually stimulating and really makes you realize how games that are made years ago are still such a smash hit title even to this day! The base principles of the portal guns are so simple to grasp on, and yet will keep your head spinning with all the twists that they put on that base mechanic. Also, GLaDOS is one of the most emotional AI I've seen and can even rival games such as Hollow Knight in terms of the lore. GREAT JOB VALVE, NOW RELEASE PORTAL 3 YOU LAZY FUCKS!
Игра, которая заставит вас ебануться головой и понять, что 11 лет обучения в школе ушли в пустую...
Ну что могу сказать, игра отличная, полностью прошел 2 раза. Для игры с другом ТОП.
Esse jogo tem um plotzinho muito doido, nunca imaginaria isso. Mas recomendo, esse jogo é muito bom mesmo. Falando em questão coop, é melhor ainda, é engraçado para um caralh.
创意工坊的老哥比官方还会做图
很好玩，我和我姐感情已经破裂了，吵得很开心（不是
one of the best game in existane.. highly recommend this game for litrelly anyone
Muito conteúdo para explorar na oficina, excelente campanha e coop muito divertido.
сначало лучше пройти портал 1 а потом портал 2
e un gioco di inteligenza scientifico con il futuro e molto carino
Dumbed down puzzles for console plebs. Still a good story.
A very fun puzzle solving game with a 10/10 story my second favourite game ever and for very good reason
great game to play by your self or with friends
La verdad es un buen juego con una buena historia y buenas experiencias que no te da cualquiera
没怎么认真写过测评，我也想不出太多词儿，好游戏，创意超前，虽然我玩的有一点头晕。
太好玩了，与其说是好玩，更觉得这款游戏有意思。结尾的音乐和动画都很好，为了截下最后印有心形的方块，看了三次动画。相爱相杀了这么长时间，哪个方块才是唯一的证明吧
great game has more story than the first protal. total a must buy.
2 mal aldık zar zor oynuyoruz ama güzel
Just.....so good. Timeless brilliance in gameplay and design. Sad its over
解密游戏，体验很好，而且打折了
still holds up 10 years later and better than alot of stuff coming out these days
Wonderful game though it is a little difficult towards the end! Story is super interesting. I definitely recommend!
buy it, but first buy the orange box.
Um game genial, se você nunca jogou um jogo de puzzle, vale a pena jogar esse aqui, e se você já joga jogos de puzzle, vale a pena também!
I love the humour, a fun & challenging game.
Good puzzle challenge, perfect amount of wit to keep me engaged.

I played both Portal games and this one takes what Portal did and makes it so much better. The story is way longer and way better in terms of depth and the dialogue of the characters is really good. Lots of hilarious lines that really make the journey through Portal 2 very enjoyable. Cave Johnson is the man.

P.S. - Remember, don't take those Lemons!!

It's the best game (and sequel to any media (even Shrek 2) ) I've ever played. I love the characters, the story, everything. Oh and also the soundtrack that's great too. The ending is wonderful and I think that this game was better ( not by much ) then portal 1. By the end of this absolute piece of art I found my self holding back tears. I can't wait to play through Portal stories: Mel ( Because I've heard that it's the closest thing to Portal 3 ) and do some co-op with my friends. It's such a roller coaster of emotion and love. You can really tell that the developers and writers poured their souls into this. Not to mention the artist's who made this ABSOLUTELY ROCKING soundtrack. Here's a link for anybody who's interested: 

This game is one of the best I've ever had the joy to play and I'd be lying to you if I didn't tell you that it's only 10 shmeckeroonies. What I mean is buy it. It's worth every cent. 

Thanks, Pepper
Really good game. If someone wants to play coop, hit me up. I am in the EU region (Italy). Better yet, comment down below.
Jogo inteligente e perspicaz voltado ao intelecto de pessoas com alto QI.Recomendo demais se quer se desafiar!
portal is amazing, but portal 2? AHHHHHHHHH IT IS THE BEST THING EVER
oyun gayet güzel herkeze tavsiye ederim
Literalmente me ha curado la depresión al jugar el coop
The sarcasm and witty humor alone is enough to enjoy this game
UN buen juego con una buena historia
